revision.text:
{{Wireless embedded system |brand=EnGenius |model=EAP300 |revision=v2 |fcc_date=11/07/2014 |manuf_country=Taiwan |is_manuf=No |manuf=Senao |manuf_model=EAP-9550 |manuf_rev=v2 |type=access point |fcc_id=A8J-EAP300A |pcb_id=7016A0636008 |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp=1 |pwr_conn=barrel |pwr_poe=af |cpu1_brand=Atheros |cpu1_model=AR9341 |fla1=8 |fla1_brand=Macronix |fla1_model= |ram1=64 |ram1_brand=Nanya |ram1_model= |serial=yes,, 4-pin header,, populated,, (115200,8,N,1) |wi1_chip1_brand=Atheros |wi1_chip1_model=AR9341 |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi1_ant_conn=U.FL |wi1_txchains=2 |wi1_rxchains=2 |wi1_sstreams=2 |eth_cpu=true |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=1 |stock_boot=U-Boot;1.1.4; |stock_os=Linux;2.6.31;OpenWrt Kamikaze; |tp_firmware=OpenWrt, |802dot11_protocols=bgn |default_ssid=EnGeniusXXXXXX, |default_ssid_regex=EnGenius[A-Fa-f0-9]{6} |default_ip=192.168.1.1 |default_user=admin |default_pass=admin |oui_eth=88:DC:96 }} {{TagLine|Long Range Ceiling Mount Access Point}} :[https://www.engeniusnetworks.eu/eap300-6 Product page] {{•}} [https://www.engeniusnetworks.eu/eap300v2-fm Downloads]
"7016A0636008" is silkscreened on the board in the FCC photos. {{See also|EnGenius|Senao}}
*[https://openwrt.org/toh/engenius/engenius_eap300_v2 ''EnGenius EAP300 v2'' on '''OpenWrt''' wiki]
